amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 106 of Division E, which states that none of the funds made available by this Act may be used to reorganize or to transfer the Civil Works functions or authority of the Corps of Engineers or the Secretary of the Army to another department or agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 91 printed in Part A of House Report 116-111 to strike section 106 of division E, which states that none of the funds made available by this Act may be used to reorganize or to transfer the Civil Works functions or authority of the Corps of Engineers or the Secretary of the Army to another department or agency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A120) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 269, 1 Present (Roll no. 364).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A120) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 269, 1 Present (Roll no. 364).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A120) offered by Mr. Graves (LA).
